name: Tactical Officer
description:
Description 

Officer will be a first-person tactical shooter based on SWAT games. It draws inspiration from games like SWAT 3, SWAT 4 and The Regiment. It will not focus on aesthetics but rather on gameplay (such as competent AI) and tactical elements.

Current Status

Officer in the very first alpha state. It is not meant to be played but rather to be noticed.

  • Basic CQB training scenario
  • Basic 2 weapon inventory system
  • Basic interaction
    • Opening doors.
Development

Officer is made by a first-time game developer with no artistic background but solid foundations on programming theory. As such, all the programming will be made from scratch, while it will be using third party sound effects, animations and models.  

Development Screenshots

 

M1911 Animations were made from scratch in Blender

The game is being made with Unity 2019

 

Final notes: Controls
  • WASD movement
  • Mouse to shoot and look around
  • Press "1, "2" to change weapon
  • Press "r" to reload
  • Press "e" to open doors.
